_comment_disableRegistrySync1: // Whether to remove Taterzens from registry sync. Auto applied in Fabric
_comment_disableRegistrySync2: // If using Forge however, this will disable WHOLE registry sync. Proceed with CAUTION.
_comment_taterzenTablistTimeout1: // After how many ticks Taterzens should be cleared from tablist.
_comment_taterzenTablistTimeout2: // Some delay is needed, otherwise clients don't fetch their skins.
_comment_fabricTailorAdvert1: // Whether to remind you that if FabricTailor mod is installed,
_comment_fabricTailorAdvert2: // it has some built-in skin swapping functionality for Taterzens as well.

defaults.name: Taterzen
defaults._comment_commandPermissionLevel: // Default command permission level of Taterzen.
defaults._comment_sounds: // Default sounds for Taterzens. Set to null to mute them.
defaults._comment_invulnerable: // Whether Taterzen is invulnerable by default.
defaults._comment_jumpWhileAttacking: // Enable jumps when Taterzen is in attack mode.

color._comment: // Which color of particles to use in path editor. Use RGB values ( 0 - 255 ).

messages._comment_messageDelay: // Default delay between each message, in ticks.
messages._comment_exitEditorAfterMsgEdit: // Whether to exit message editor mode after editing a message.

perms._comment_npcCommandPermissionLevel1: // Permission level required to execute /npc command.
perms._comment_npcCommandPermissionLevel2: // Valid only if LuckPerms isn't present.
perms._comment_taterzensCommandPermissionLevel: // Permission level required to execute /taterzens command.
// Valid only if LuckPerms isn't present.
perms._comment_allowSettingHigherPermissionLev: // Whether to allow players to set the permission level
// of Taterzen higher than their own. Careful! This could
// enable players to bypass their permission level with NPC.
